Retrieve global daily prevalence of a lineage

Source: R/getGlobalPrevalence.R
getGlobalPrevalence.Rd

Retrieves the global daily prevalence of a PANGO lineage

getGlobalPrevalence(pangolin_lineage, mutations = NULL, cumulative = NULL)

Arguments

pangolin_lineage:

PANGO lineage name
mutations:

(optional) a `vector` of mutation(s)
cumulative:

(optional) `Boolean` (T/F), T returns cumulative global prevalence since first day of detection

Value

dataframe

Examples

# B.1.1.7 lineage
b117 = getGlobalPrevalence(pangolin_lineage = "B.1.1.7", mutations = "S:E484K")

#> Retrieving data... 
head(b117)

#>         date total_count lineage_count total_count_rolling
#> 1 2020-12-17        4704             1            5042.429
#> 2 2020-12-18        4606             1            5109.429
#> 3 2020-12-19        3013             0            5184.429
#> 4 2020-12-20        2893             0            5267.429
#> 5 2020-12-21        8655             0            5038.143
#> 6 2020-12-22        4095             0            4664.000
#>   lineage_count_rolling   proportion proportion_ci_lower proportion_ci_upper
#> 1             0.1428571 2.833102e-05        9.738401e-08        0.0004980549

#> 3             0.2857143 5.511008e-05        9.471660e-08        0.0004844162
#> 4             0.2857143 5.424170e-05        9.322408e-08        0.0004767847

#> 6             0.2857143 6.125950e-05        1.052762e-07        0.0005384074
